buildTarget.description: The target to run to build you the app.

buildTargetOptions.description: Additional options to pass into the build target.

fileToRunMode.description: Mode specifying how the Node file to run is determined; either from the package.json of the build target, inferred from the build target or specified explicitly.

fileToRun.description: Optional specification of the Node file to run (if present this setting overrides `fileToRunMode`).

args.description: Arguments passed to the Node script.

moduleResolutionOverrides.description: Optional ESM module resolution overrides; key is the specifier, value if the full absolute path of the file to load.

color.description: Use colors when showing output of command.

cwd.description: Current working directory of the commands. If it's not specified the commands will run in the workspace root, if a relative path is specified the commands will run in that path relative to the workspace root and if it's an absolute path the commands will run in that path.

env.description: Environment variables that will be made available to the commands. This property has priority over the `.env` files.

envFile.description: You may specify a custom .env file path.

tty.description: Whether commands should be run with a tty terminal
